content.html: BREAKING: I have just received evidence of a massive Twitter data breach affecting millions of Twitter accounts in EU and US. I have contacted a sample of the affected accounts and they confirmed that the breached data is accurate. This breach occurred no earlier than 2021. 1/
content.value:
BREAKING: I have just received evidence of a massive Twitter data breach affecting millions of Twitter accounts in EU and US.

I have contacted a sample of the affected accounts and they confirmed that the breached data is accurate. 

This breach occurred no earlier than 2021. 1/
